p: The phytochemical investigations of the leaves of Acacia sieberiana led to the isolation of six phenolic including one flavone: luteolin ( 6) and five flavone glycosides: chrysoeriol-7- O-rutinoside ( 1), luteolin-7- O-rutinoside ( 2), chrysoeriol-7- O-β- D-glucopyranoside ( 3), apigenin-7- O-β- D-glucopyranoside ( 4), luteolin-3′,4′-dimethoxylether-7- O-β- D-glucoside ( 5) and a terpenoid, the sterol glycoside identified as sitosterol-3- O-β- D-glucoside ( 7) ( Figure 1).
